article.title: Simple List of FileSharing sites.
article.text:
Here is a collection of various file-sharing sites found around ZeroNet. If you don't see one listed here please add it.


'''Books:'''
* [zero://Antilibrary.bit AntiLibrary]: Uses IFS to maintain book catalogs that are separated by languages.
* [zero://zeropub.bit ZeroPub]

'''Files:'''
* [zero://1Dphm8Mth9WYN9fPm1yxj8Y4WhcKRhYXJJ BinChan's 0-Share]
* [zero://12MVkvYGcRW6u2NYbpfwVad1oQeyG4s9Er Intergalactic File Server]: Uses IFS
* [zero://1uPLoaDwKzP6MCGoVzw48r4pxawRBdmQc ZeroUP]: Whole various file hosting

'''Important Files:'''
* [zero://15Pf9VVuDT8NSWj1qUBh4V89yPmrmzRw6a Manually Maintained Directories]

'''Magnet Links:'''
* [zero://BoxHD.bit Box-HD]: HD TV Series Box Sets delivered in a 'Play' style UI
* [zero://1LBr1dHoXvJAMjDgW8Wcg5kbCoKyJnzo6p KickAssTorrent (KAT)]: KAT in pre alpha version
* [zero://1J3JSAxiM3uhpkp2dymY59yud8r2RGW6MA Play+]
* [zero://1AnimePihDhcbVdK1nvnbSEtH4oKU8RAYG Play Anime]: A wide selection of titles from the Anime genre.
* [zero://1PLAYgDQboKojowD3kwdb3CtWmWaokXvfp Play Movies]: A wide selection of titles of various classic genres
* [zero://tvepisodes.bit TV Episodes]: tvepisodes.bit is a weekly feed of TV episodes.
* [zero://1BEJbnufyav7TK23ADTs2Qi2UJeKSGDzw6 ZeroTV]: Download TV Series. (Down/Empty)
* [zero://1HwH4hfRhohJGVtZMBYprYKyHcuJNwL4sZ ZeroTV mirror]

'''Misc:'''
* [zero://1DaXkbpBN7d9h78T5mjB2gTV9Ui46Bjwcv The Snowden Files]
* [zero://1BXLnSBQrCamckJfJoTfyyvpYXTvWy6rts/html.zip/wikileaks_torrent.html WikiLeaks Torrents]

'''Music:'''
* [zero://ZeroLSTN.bit ZeroLSTN]: Audio library with playlist functionality
* [zero://1MusicXkuN2pk5hRdmroeyaCLDJtzTicpB ZeroMusic]: Whole music file hosting.

'''Texts:'''
* [zero://1MgHVPCE1ve6QfKrgsqCURzRj72HrRWioz NullPaste]

'''Torrents:'''
* [zero://1ShArE1dJFcHFgTEEAUMXksDZuRckzd3Y Torrent Share]
* [zero://192dZ1EG5tU7PnCfuwGMDEBrr2eLqvs4t3 ZeroTorrent]

'''Torrent Information & Censorship circumvention:'''
* [zero://15qQZydzmaw6KpW8zWXz3XRmxQf4tQEqxX FOMO]: List of a torrent trackers and indexes
* [zero://171amnchKeBrXnDVooTMKhHH9npTu1hRWj UNBLOCKED-PW]: Provides proxy access to clearnet file-sharing sites.

'''Video:'''
* [zero://big.kopykate.bit big.Kopykate.bit]: Most popular Youtube variant, official branch, support for large files, lots of content.
* [zero://1aCq7GiJfUfGZ4GftjYaYbsEngPFzcxvN Kopykate]: File size limit, not maintained
* [zero://149EPBN4hQRpwj5TcoPETepnoXHCUXzaCN YouTube]: Porn oriented site
* [zero://1EdV58wumiWEXsncGsi213XpfaM43XX2dc YouTube中文站]: 视频上传播放网╰(*°▽°*)╯哔哩哔哩。勿发色情(/▽＼)
